Header: New Director Budget & Finance Management Takes Office
Content: Colonel T.C Meththananda of Sri Lanka General Service Corps on Thursday (31) assumed duties as the new Director Budget and Finance Management of the Army at the Directorate in Dalugama, Kelaniya during a brief ceremony. The newly-appointed Director signed an official document after religious observances and symbolized the acceptance of the new Directorate. Staff officers of the Directorate and other ranks were present during the occasion.
